entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -25.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
